WorkItem.Description:
Evaluating my bear gear and upgrades, I came across a strange discrepancy with the Seal of Many Mouths.
Â 
ilvl 264 - 2034.88 improvement. Shown on upgrade list.
ilvl 277 - 1267.xx improvement. NOT shown on upgrade list. I had to manually Evaluate Upgrade.

Comments.Message: Of note, both Seals appear to be displaying correct stats. Adding this to include my upgrade list.

Don't know if it's related... Harbinger's Bone Band dropped. My upgrade list showed it. I ran a manual Evaluate Upgrade to use the Equip All function, and that said it wasn't an upgrade. I marked it available, ran an Optimize, and got a better score with it included.

Ron's suggested I have a messed up cache, so I'm deleting and reinstalling Rawr right now.

I had a similar issue last night with my shadow priest - a 232 off-hand from HoR wasn't showing in my Upgrades list (only got the crafted ilvl200 off-hand atm).   When I went into the off-hands comparison page, it showed that the 232 was worth almost nothing.   When I marked it available and optimised, it was an obvious upgrade.

I checked the RSVs page and there was no unusual stats shown (negative haste or anything).

The previous issue seemed to be a cache corruption issue; I was able to reload the cache and get better results.

However, now I'm having a more persistent issue with my Cat file (included). Upgrade lists keep insisting that the non-heroic Rimetooth Pendant is better than the heroic. This is sticking despite an attempt to update the item cache, as well as upgrading from .20 to .21.
Sorry, the kitty issue seems to be a different one, so I'm going to open a separate issue on it.
